title: Getting Started
text: can install development version fleetbr GitHub :

title: Getting Started
text: Afterwards, package can loaded along dplyr, ggplot2 lubridate packages filtering plotting subset data: example, time series data state São Paulo displayed:
code: library(fleetbr) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(lubridate) fleetbr |>    filter(uf == "SP",          modal %in% c("TOTAL", "AUTOMOVEL", "MOTOCICLETA")) |>    mutate(     date = ym(paste0(ano,"-",mes))   ) |>    ggplot(aes(date,frota, color = modal)) + geom_line()

title: Authors and Citation
text: João Pedro Melani Saraiva. Author, maintainer. Pedro Augusto Borges Santos. Author. ONSV - National Road Safety Observatory. Copyright holder, funder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Saraiva JPM, Santos PAB (2025). fleetbr: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset. R package version 0.2.4, https://jotasaraiva.github.io/fleetbr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {fleetbr: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset},   author = {João Pedro Melani Saraiva and Pedro Augusto Borges Santos},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.2.4},   url = {https://jotasaraiva.github.io/fleetbr/}, }

title: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset
text: goal fleetbr provide dataset nationwide vehicle counts state mode transportation Brazil, provided Brazilian Ministry Transport. dataset provided tibble format.

title: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset
text: can install development version fleetbr GitHub :

title: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset
text: basic example shows data displayed:
code: library(fleetbr)  head(fleetbr, 15) #>    uf mes  ano           modal  frota #> 1  AC   1 2011           TOTAL 152592 #> 2  AC   1 2011       AUTOMOVEL  51188 #> 3  AC   1 2011           BONDE      0 #> 4  AC   1 2011        CAMINHAO   5180 #> 5  AC   1 2011 CAMINHAO TRATOR    436 #> 6  AC   1 2011     CAMINHONETE  14719 #> 7  AC   1 2011       CAMIONETA   2630 #> 8  AC   1 2011   CHASSI PLATAF     12 #> 9  AC   1 2011      CICLOMOTOR     10 #> 10 AC   1 2011    MICRO-ONIBUS    174 #> 11 AC   1 2011     MOTOCICLETA  62683 #> 12 AC   1 2011        MOTONETA  12448 #> 13 AC   1 2011          ONIBUS    584 #> 14 AC   1 2011     QUADRICICLO      0 #> 15 AC   1 2011         REBOQUE   1180

title: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset
text: package can cited follows:
code: citation("fleetbr") #> To cite package 'fleetbr' in publications use: #>  #>   Saraiva JPM, Santos PAB (2024). _fleetbr: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet #>   Dataset_. https://jotasaraiva.github.io/fleetbr/, #>   https://github.com/jotasaraiva/fleetbr. #>  #> A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is #>  #>   @Manual{, #>     title = {fleetbr: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset}, #>     author = {João Pedro Melani Saraiva and Pedro Augusto Borges Santos}, #>     year = {2024}, #>     note = {https://jotasaraiva.github.io/fleetbr/, https://github.com/jotasaraiva/fleetbr}, #>   }

title: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset — fleetbr
text: package includes dataset road vehicle data provided Brazilian Ministry Transport.

title: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset — fleetbr
text: tibble data frame 92,664 5 columns: uf Federative Unit - Brazilian States Acronyms mes, ano Month Year modal Mode transport observation frota Fleet size

title: Brazilian Vehicle Fleet Dataset — fleetbr
text: https://www.gov.br/transportes/pt-br/assuntos/transito/conteudo-Senatran/estatisticas-frota-de-veiculos-senatran
